body_html:
Hi! Could you write an example of this function? I can't understand the type of input_size. By the way, in new torch version, conv layers don't have bias.data. So maybe you can change the following part:

# iterate through parameters and count num params
                for name, p in module._parameters.items():
body:
Hi! Could you write an example of this function? I can't understand the type of input_size. By the way, in new torch version, conv layers don't have bias.data. So maybe you can change  the following part:
```
# iterate through parameters and count num params
                for name, p in module._parameters.items():
```
